attributes.action: Closing the TA for 6 months is liable to close the organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What happens then about the 20-30% of troops from the TA in war zones at the moment if they have nothing to come home to? A stupied knee jerk reaction AGAIN from this government.
 
Bring TA training back TODAY.

With all the money wasted on outside bodies carrying out services that could be done in house, this would more then cover the money the government are trying to save. EG medicals at £150 per time carried out by OHSAS, (Do we not have medical staff in the TA). Road side Vehicle [green fleet] repair and recovery now carried out by AA why can’t REME do the job when they are out with us on FTX. Catering, the slop that is served to us on FTX by landmark surly o TA cooks could do a better job and save the MOD some money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
